description: This file defines a data model for session summaries and a class for generating such summaries using a language model. It includes methods for formatting responses, constructing system prompts, and running summarization both synchronously and asynchronously.

classes.name: SessionSummaryResponse
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the session summary, including a concise summary and optional topics discussed.

classes.name: SessionSummarizer
classes.description: A class responsible for generating session summaries using a specified language model, with methods for formatting responses, constructing prompts, and executing summarization tasks.

methods.name: get_response_format
methods.description: Determines the response format based on the model's capabilities, returning either a Pydantic model, a JSON schema, or a generic JSON object.

methods.name: get_system_message
methods.description: Constructs the system prompt message for the summarization task, including conversation context and optional additional instructions.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Performs synchronous session summarization given a conversation, returning a structured summary if successful.

methods.name: arun
methods.description: Performs asynchronous session summarization given a conversation, returning a structured summary if successful.
